description: Aokiji places his hand in water and instantly freezes a massive area of ocean, including any creatures within it. The technique can freeze the sea for miles in all directions.
firstUseContext: Aokiji uses Ice Age to freeze the ocean surrounding Long Ring Long Land to help stranded people cross to safety, also freezing a Sea King that appeared.

description: Aokiji freezes grass, water vapor, or other materials by blowing on them to create a blade-like weapon made of ice that can be used in combat.
firstUseContext: Aokiji creates an Ice Saber by freezing blades of grass with his breath and attempts to slash Robin with it, though Zoro intercepts the attack.

description: Aokiji freezes his own body while in contact with a target, causing the target to freeze solid as well. This technique can freeze multiple targets simultaneously or freeze a single target completely.
firstUseContext: Aokiji uses Ice Time twice - first to freeze Luffy's fist, Zoro's arm, and Sanji's leg simultaneously when they attack him, then later to completely freeze Robin by grabbing her in a bear hug.

name.japanese: トレインタ・フルール・クラッチ

description: Robin sprouts thirty arms on or around a target to grab them by the limbs and neck, then uses a clutching motion to break their bones and spine.
firstUseContext: Robin uses Treinta Fleur: Clutch on Aokiji in a desperate attempt to defeat him, successfully shattering his ice body but failing to harm him due to his Logia intangibility.
